newsitem.title: USA: Ahmanson seeks waiting period between votes.
newsitem.headline: Ahmanson seeks waiting period between votes.

text.p: H.F. Ahmanson and Co said it asked Delaware Chancery Court to require six weeks between certification of directors elected to Great Western Financial Corp's board and a Great Western shareholder meeting to vote on its proposed merger with Washington Mutual Inc.
Great Western agreed to merge with Washington Mutual in an effort to thwart Ahmanson's hostile takeover bid.

Ahmanson said it is no longer seeking to advance the Great Western annual meeting before June 13, but said any newly elected Great Western directors should have a chance to be heard by fellow directors before a stockholder vote were held on the Great Western-Washington Mutual deal.
